inflate.Title: filter.zip.inflate
inflate.SummaryLine: Decompress ZIP file data into table form.

Returns.Desc: A table containing the directory hierarchy from a decompressed string (or stream) <u>table</u>.

data.Desc: The string (or stream) to decompress <u>string or stream</u>.

SeeAlso.Title: The filter modules - encoding, encryption and compression

inflate.Desc:
Decompress ZIP data.

The decompressed file contents are returned in an hierarchical structure reflecting the directory structure within the ZIP file. Directory and file names are represented as table keys and data as table values.

deflate.Title: filter.zip.deflate
deflate.SummaryLine: Compress a table into binary ZIP data.

Returns.Desc: A binary string containing the compressed zip data <u>string</u>.

table.Desc: The table of files and directories and their contents (directories may be nested) <u>table</u>.

SeeAlso.Title: The filter modules - encoding, encryption and compression
